keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promotes job total with record high while wages surge, asserts that the benefits cap 'leads more into work', speaks of tax cuts for workers and savers, reducing the deficit, income tax cut, more jobs, and new businesses.
Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt, Labour is 'Scotting alliance' and would lead to spending up, more debt, higher taxes, and jobs lost.

mentions.candidate: Jonathan is a champion for our local NHS and especially for Woking Community Hospital. He wants a thriving local economy while protecting the character of our neighbourhoods.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Vince Cable: Lib Dems could enter rainbow coalition with Labour and SNP. Labour to 'Scottish ransom' - Salmond. Labour is Scotting alliance.

issues.economy: Promotes job growth, high wages, tax cuts, more jobs, new businesses, and deficit reduction.
issues.health: Jonathan is a champion for our local NHS and especially for Woking Community Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonathan lives locally and he will always put local people first.

contactInformation.address: Printed by EweMove, on behalf of Jonathan Lord, both of Churchill House, Chobham Road, Woking, Surrey, GU21 4AA. Promoted by Edward Norman, on behalf of Jonathan Lord, both of Churchill House, Chobham Road, Woking, Surrey, GU21 4AA. Printed by St Ives plc, One Tudor St, London, EC4Y 0AH.
